title: Puppy_Linux_Slacko64_archive_6-Feb-2014
description:
from/more at <a href=" http://woof-ce.26403.n7.nabble.com/Slacko64-td257.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://woof-ce.26403.n7.nabble.com/Slacko64-td257.html</a>

This is the second alpha release of a 64 bit Puppy from woof-CE!  6-Feb-2014


iso : 198M 
devx : 146M 
kernel source : 101M 
delta from 5.8.7 to 5.8.8 : 61M

5.8.8 Changes 

ADDITIONS 
cddetect_quick 
915-resolution 
missing bins (or, and, dotquad - jamesbond) 
libgphoto2_DEV (wrong paths in .la files) 
sane > xsane (needs testing) 
didiwiki 
dict > pdict works 
mhwaveedit 
elspci 
ddcprobe 
hunspell 
gcolor2 
htop 
fpm2 
pnscan > peasyport 
galculator 
gexec 
gmeasures 
gxmessage 
sfontview 
pfontview 
dunst (notify daemon - in /usr/sbin/mtpdevice you can change the variable 
- @LINE-15 POPUP= to POPUP=1 to try it out. Seems a bit unreliable that's why its not default) 
jimtcl (tclsh symlink) 
usb-modeswitch 
wv-dial > pupdial 
e3 
bacon 
bacon-gui 
f2fs-tools > installers 
guvcview-1.7.1 (many thanks for jamesbond's gtk2 patches) 
dropbear (client/server) 
mptdetect (thanks to can8v,tempestuous for ground breaking work) 

BUGFIXES 
caps (pequlizer - works now) 
homebank .desktop 
sylpheed .desktop 
leafpad .desktop 
30 deep lib64 dirs!!! (my bad) 
/etc/profile $LD_LIBRARY_PATH 
pdict 
urxvt rebuilt "--disable-perl" 
frisbee (npierce patch for static IP) 
pui (untested for usb installs in normal PUPMODE=13, you can do it manually) 
firewall install script 

UPDATES 
jwmconfig3 updated 
- new keyboard gui (SFR) and other improvements 
- now you can change title bar icons (thanks to SFR for being the guinea pig) 
cups_pdf (rcrsn51) 
smbw_cups_backend (rcrsn51) (old smb and smbc removed) 
jwm-2.2 (joewing's new stable release) 
pmusic-4.2.4 (zigbert) 
pburn-4.3.4 (zigbert) 
Pup-Kview-1.3 (radky) 
Pup-sysinfo-2.4 (radky) 
getflash-1.5-1 (shinobar's patched for 64) 
sfs_load-2.0-2 (shinobar) 
ff-convert-1.4-1 (shinobar) 
linux-3.13.1 (patched for aufs, configured for f2fs and UEFI) 

DELETED 
grub (all versions don't work, need to install via another pup or - 
- if you know what you are doing grab the grub2 package from ibiblio or mirror) 

ISSUES 
grub-legacy config is still in the menu 
I think YASSM is broken due to full samba 
-------------------------------------------------------------
